review_text: dryer couldn t dry cloths after 3 hours of trying location is next to nothing but the train station temp of a c but find out it s extra clean new friendly enough staff

staff are amazingly helpfully loved having the airport transfer and were always on time the doors into the rooms are mighty squeaky no mirror in the one washroom which was a pain loved the free internet was very useful in room 19 loved having the heater but didn t like the fact that there is a very bright light on it
the hostel is great in everything just sometimes bathrooms were a bit smelly paper or a machine to dry your hands will be nice either

nice little hostel with a large common room where almost everyone seems to hang out in the evenings making it pretty easy to meet people got the best sleep i d ever had in a hostel as many of the beds mine included are cozy enclosed cubicles with a curtain and reading light that provide plenty of privacy block out light and minimize vibration e g from the person in the upper bunk only downside was that the location was a bit of a trek

the location is absolutely gorgeous and the hostel itself is wonderful i regret not having more time to stay here the area is very quiet and peaceful sitting directly in the mountains the rooms are kept pristine and the staff is incredibly kind and helpful the hotspring bath they have is lovely clean and well worth trying if you want a place to stay to go hiking travel in the area and relax in a natural and beautiful place i cannot recommend this place heavily enough

i stayed there two night and i have to admit it is a great hostel according to what you pay the location is just brilliant in the middle of chinatown lively area and close to the main sights breakfast was ok and super friendly and helpful staff eeverything was tidy and clean one thing that i really liked is that as soon as we checked in they gave us a ticket and we could have a drink for free and the nearby reggea mansion bar which is a cool terrace disco with a nice view of the city

stayed at room 2 there was mould everywhere extremely unhealthy the floor was dirty and wasn t cleaned it rained on arrivel so the footprints from our boots were quite good to see despite a sign saying rooms are cleaned daily the receptionist on arrival was playing her music loudly during check in showers were okay but the ventilator wasn t cleaned in ages during our stay staff aked us if the beds in our room not used by us were free very unprofessional worst hostel i ever stayed at
i loved this hostel very clean great location the staff were very friendly and helpful in advising how to get to the places around good size rooms and lockers for your belongings

has the potential to be a really nice hostel in real need of a good clean and maintenance once completed this would be real good joel the owner is a really nice guy and good host if he sorts those things out will be good
very centrally located good value friendly staff

amazing place amazing people perfect location so central and easy to find it s a brand new hostel and it s awesome the dorm rooms are spacious with their own bathrooms and there s a lot of common space including a big kitchen and really cool and comfy tv room this is a great place if you are traveling by yourself as there are always activities planned and the staff make sure you get involved bottom line stay here
convenient central location cosy quiet atmosphere with very helpful and welcoming staff a great simple hostel with everything you could need would stay here again recommended
i had a great stay at st christopher s made all the more enjoyable by the friendly staff and great facilities would recommend a stay here to family and friends for sure

this is a great place best hostel experience i ve had in morocco the staff is genuinely friendly they treated me like a home guest and gave me a great opportunity to experience and understand the local culture it s also great to meet other travelers and share great moments with new friends if you want an authentic essouira experience not just somewhere to sleep this is the place to stay and the medina location is perfect
lovely family that runs this well organized great location very friendly usual free breakfast but more available for small cost very good beds quiet location near everything

location is a bit out of town 30 mins walk to main station but not really a problem dorms were basic mosquito nets on all the beds clean bathrooms and breakfast included there s not really much of a common area just the table where breakfast was served we only stayed 1 night but staff seemed friendly and held our bags for the day would stay here again

this is in no way a hostel it is a campsite with box huts and a massive communal shower toilet complex which is where the locals or staff hang out to pick up girls on their way out way over priced and the food is expensive don t expect to chill by the pool as music is pumping from 10am also doors on the box huts lock themselves so we were charged a 10 to get our key out of our room lucky we hired a 4x4 and got into the town which is beautiful

if i had booked this as a hotel i would have been very happy the rooms were superb and i was impressed with the reception given by the staff as well as complementary gifts on arrival it is located very close to the train station and it is easy to see the city walking from the front door despite all of the above i would not classify this accommodation as a hostel since there were no common areas no kitchen no lounge no games room or any other area one is able to socialize
nice and quiet hostel the rooms where good with private bathrooms nice pool and outdoor area good value for the money

the hostel staff were friendly and professional and the place had a nice relaxed atmosphere and very comfortable rooms a few hours after we arrived we asked them for help planning a trip around rajasthan and they straight away planned a great trip for us with a personal driver for a very reasonable price we are currently nearing the end of the tour and it has been a great experience many thanks

if your looking for somewhere to relax meet people and have some fun this hostel is perfect the rooms are big the bar is cheap and the staff are really helpful i had a great time at this hostel and can t say a bad word about it at night pub crawls and trivia are organised among other things to get everyone together the outdoor pool area was great to chill at in the afternoon this hostel is the perfect place to make some friends and have a good time
i stayed at the new building which was pretty cool new nice room clean organized with a nice balcon and calm there s no area for hanging around with people though

if you are just looking for a place to lay your head at night this is it don t expect frills or top notch security literally anyone can walk through those doors and up to the rooms if they know where they re going staff were super helpful with getting me to gatwick at 4am and moved me to a bottom bunk when i asked to overall it s decent but if i go back i d stay elsewhere and maybe book in advance

considering ny prices it fits even if it is expensive when compared to average price of hostels in main capitals of the world such as london paris etc where you can stay for half of this price with more facilities etc i will suggest them to have towels for rent considering it is a hostel it is ok to save money on this item but usually backpackers travel with small luggages and a towel is always something big and havy to carry on rent this item would be a nice solution for both parties

average room you would expect on a budget so no problem wonderful green hilltop view from rooftop restaurant great food cooked to order but breakfast could use some variety unless you re a fan of cold white toast the staff speak no english are too over worked to find the time to learn so you might want to slip them a nice tip but the husband wife managers are very helpful overall a decent low budget stay tip use a torch on approach road at night my cellphone torch was fine
incredibly cool hostel but it has bed bugs actually saw one crawling around my bed someone else in my room got bit apart from that the place is super cool very high tech knowledgable staff

sebastian is so nice thank you the girls well they do they job very important that the breakfast starts at 9 00 not before that they think hostel is little bit outside the city close to the beach there is parties every night so if you don t like those it could be little bit noisy if you like you will have a good time there is lot of hammocks that you can spend your time liked it rooms are really small you really don t have space for your things

taco taco taco his genuine hospitality made me feel at home he is very knowledgeable of what to do where to go and how much it should cost goes above beyond he deserves to be tipped it will help his nepali family steve was an excellent host at the outback restaurant funny guy pros 1 location in haad rin 5 7 minute walk to sunrise beach where the full moon party takes place 2 3 minute walk to sunset beach where ferry can take you to ko samui 2 atmosphere
everything was fantastic except the stench in the women s bathrooms
not suitable for travellers with huge luggage bedrooms with stairs
great hostel great timw there walking distance from everywhere and pub crawl every day

i would definitely stay here again the owner francesco is very nice and extremely helpful our room was very clean and had a huge locker the beds were comfy and the whole place was very clean the terrace was beautiful a great view and lots of seating the directions to the hostel sounded strange to us at first but they made complete sense once we were walking to the hostel thanks for a great stay
this place was fantastic the lockers were huge the beds comfortable and the location perfect i never had to wait for a toilet or shower breakfast was nice

rooms are tiny but that is to be expected from staying on a boat breakfast is included and is a traditional european breakfast rooms were cleaned everyday the owner is super friendly and is there on the boat if you needed to ask something she does lock the main part after 23h but there are back doors that lead directly to room corridors i would highly recommend and would most definitely stay again
friendly staff and nice location

great hostel very nice staff had a nice stay overall just a few suggestions for improvement which would make a huge difference wifi available everywhere air conditioning in common areas not just rooms and especially in the entrance which is where the wifi is kitchen could be better equipped can t do much in there

this is a very nice and clean guesthouse out of the center of siem reap the staff are very helpful and friendly the group meals are a great way to meet the other guests i like the location since it is in a quieter area but still only 2 blocks from a main road
it was really good

this hostel wasn t as nice as others we have stayed at but it did the job our bathroom was not very clean and the water was cold the downstairs showers weren t very clean but the water was hot so we showered down there most of the time it was close to the beach which was good and the bar was great for drinks the rooms were nice and clean with good security very comfy beds
great little hostel clean comfortable and the bed was one of the softest i ve stayed on in a lonnnnng time
we were very pleased to spend our hollidays in this hostel

the showers were tiny and leaked into the carpet outside so it smelled a bit funky that being said the staff was very friendly it s a great location and the place was likely still recovering from some pretty massive flooding that happened a few months back so i m sure it ll get better

this was a great hostel rooms were big and spacious security was great and had a fantastic common area which offered live music at times from the easy going staff hostel was very inclusive and you d have no problems making new friends should you be travelling solo loved the activities and nighttime pub crawls the hostel hostel staff know all the good spots and amy tears it up on the dance floor so pack your dancing shoes
bed was slightly uncomfortable and the pillow was thin but other than that the hostel was great it s right next to the subway which made getting around milan incredibly easy
beautiful hostel the bunks were spacious and the facilities were exceptionally clean well worth the money i ll definitely stay here again if i go back to bangkok

a lot of long termers lifers living there guy in my room got up early to go to work every day which woke me up and turned the lights out at 10 in the evening to go to sleep which was annoying also there is a main road outside where you can here the cars which can make it difficult to sleep if you are a sensitive sleeper no free tea or coffee after 12 hostel has a nice garden to sit in and staff will help you
nice stay
wifi connection is only thing should be strongly improved
i found the hostal very nice and people who work there are also very fine especially a girl called tania who had a lot of nice moment with us thank you tania

had a good time at the deejai the staff is really friendly and the place is really good to relax and meet other travellers but if you prefer a good sleep in the night you should go somewhere else coz it can be really late until the last people are leaving the backyard
ridiculous without outlets in the room

really love this hostel the location is good close to a main shopping street with only 5 mins walk our room is very clean cosy and lovely the breakfast buffet provides many choice of food and all of them taste really good staff are nice and wifi works well in all area of the hostel hostel price is reasonable nothing to complain
it was very clean hotel staff could have been more helpful overall a nice stay
this hostel is one of the best that i ve been the staffs are very good
nice staff plenty of knowlege of the area

i stayed in a single room a few blocks away from the actual hostel but it was good nonetheless the room was large the kitchen was well equipped and there were computers walking from the room to the hostel was a short pleasant walk to grab the breakfast and dinner and to hang out in the common areas the location of the hostel is good within walking distance of all of the city attractions

the hotel s best points are its price and location it is right on the port close to the metro and perfect for early morning ferries as a lone female traveller i didn t fancy taking the metro at 5am to the port so this was a good alternative if you want somewhere cheap to stay for the night then this place is fine but i would not pay more then 30euro bathroom was newly tiled and nice tv was small but had cnn which was good i think the hotel could offer to give a wake up call to guests

we found that the man working at reception named bruno was really lovely and helpful he was able to book a your for us last minute and settle a billing dispute bruno was so helpful that in one day of working all day he lost his voice in an attempt to please everyone aside from that the hostel was pretty good the location is a bit out of the way but there are lots of buses to catch
felt grimy the common space was way too small had to pay extra for almost everything

vardar family pension is a simple but very confortable house it s very near to bus terminal in the center of the sela uk with fruit s tree around the streets and a very calm atmosphere i recommend a lot mainly if you re going to sela uk only as a passage to visit efes
great hostel very clean well organised cute decoration and good price my only complain is the shower that was always cold
very lovely hostel helpful and friendly staff cheap cold beer at the reception and only few minutes walk away from the city center

awesome hostel with awesome staff and awesome people had a great 3 nights here and would highly recommend it to any traveler it was the first hostel on my trip and it was a ton of fun only worry was that the rooms were a bit musty and there may or may not have been black mold like stuff on the walls

ww stayed for 2 days and it was really good hot water breakfast everyone was nice to us even when arriving late night and the hostel itself has some pretty cool decoration we would definitly stay here again

second stay there coming back was not a coincidence although it is not one of those all new hostels it is a very nice place to stay staff is super helpfull and very kind would definetly stay there again and again
i enjoyed my time with hostel pisa within reasonable walking distance of the plane train and tower the hostel had pretty good wifi a 7 lunch and dinner buffet and was overall pretty good

the staff here are really amazing people so kind welcoming and helpful bruno invited me to have mate with him and told me a lot of local stories when i had to cancel one night they gave me the money back without hesitation still treated me like family the location is excellent as well a few blocks from the bus station also in the safest neighborhood right across the park and there are university around i wish they have a heater in the dining room because in the winter it s really cold
lots of space near good cheap eating places breakfast a bit thin but easily made up for in prague tram stop a bit far but once there you can get anywhere wrong side of town for walking though
realy friendly stuff good quality of rooms a lot of facilities located in the very good location it s only around 20minutes walk to the river worth of any recommendation

very secure across the river from the city center but easy access to tram and nice scenic walk through the park to the castle area also a great common area with cheap tasty beer where wi fi works better than in the room map provided was very good and staff had good recommendations for everything
great place to stay in the rooms are very clean one of the best hostels i have stayed in so far
great comfortable place with a nice rooftop and lounge to hang out the staff helped us book onward travel and was very accommodating when we arrived at 1am
nice hostel friendly staff a10 min walk from the subway and clean

tom s hostel should be a destination point for everyone visiting ireland he lives in the country with his family but is only about ten minutes from waterford theyre the nicest people we ve met so far in ireland and aoife s hilarious that s his little daughter
cool hostel with a nice outdoor area relaxing time clean rooms and bathrooms tiny but good kitchen lovely staff
excelent accomodation facilities and well maintained only a lack of atmosphere due to lack of people in the hostel at the time of booking

great stay friendly staff i was let down because there were no more discount tickets left for the aquarium when i arrived and the lady didn t offer another day or to do anything else about it i heard later the aquarium might have a foreigner discount but i am not sure how to get it

even though it is a very teenager hostel the overall experience was good some of the showers were not working properly but all the rest was pretty good if you are not a teenager i would not recommend you to stay there just for the fact that you may feel a bit annoyed sometimes

the mendoza inn has friendly staff and plenty of activities tours that can be arranged through them my room was dated cold and the matress was average i ended up staying one night in another hostel which was much better than this one

the staff is excellent and very helpful while the rooms do not have much character they do have a mini kitchen for eating or fixing one s own meals i would recommend staying at the hongdae guesthouse when in seoul
the owners are super friendly but do not speak a word of english
a little oasis in the jungle of bangkok it s a quiet place near the crazy khaosan road
is a great hostel friendly atmosphere great location and friendly staff
loved your breakfast spread
was only there for three nights but had a nice time there beautiful house and rally helpful friendly staff a great quieter choice in auckland
